ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Factions Expanded - Core
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: Vanilla Factions Expanded - Core incorporates several key functionalities that may be shared across all Vanilla Factions Expanded modules. Examples of shared functionality include custom base generation, customisable sieges, faction-based pack animal textures, scenario-dependent faction relations, and shields.
